pages.text: The $(mob)Feral Goblin$() is a monster that has no natural spawn location. It attacks players on sight, by engaging in melee. $(mob)Feral Goblins$() may spawn with wooden weapons and occasionally spawn with a shield which renders them immune to ranged attacks.
$(mob)Feral Goblins$() drop $(item)Iron Nuggets$() on death, which can be combined to make $(item)Iron Ingots$().
